statements: SELECT * FROM customer_geographical_coordinates;
SELECT customer_id, latitude, longitude FROM customer_geographical_coordinates;
SELECT customer_id, latitude FROM customer_geographical_coordinates WHERE longitude < 0;
SELECT customer_id FROM customer_geographical_coordinates ORDER BY latitude DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_geographical_coordinates WHERE longitude BETWEEN -90 AND 90;
SELECT * FROM customer_geographical_coordinates WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT customer_id, latitude FROM customer_geographical_coordinates WHERE longitude > 0;
SELECT customer_id, longitude FROM customer_geographical_coordinates WHERE latitude < 0;
SELECT * FROM customer_geographical_coordinates ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT AVG(latitude), MAX(longitude) FROM customer_geographical_coordinates;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, latitude, longitude FROM customers WHERE id = 2;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, latitude, longitude FROM customers WHERE latitude > 30 AND longitude < -100;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM campaigns;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name FROM customers WHERE longitude > -100;
SELECT id, name, latitude, longitude FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE latitude = target_latitude AND longitude = target_longitude;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM campaigns WHERE target_latitude > 30 AND target_longitude < 50;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, latitude, longitude FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, latitude, longitude FROM customers WHERE latitude > 40;
SELECT * FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, target_location, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE end_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE longitude > 0.0
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, latitude, longitude FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT campaign_name, target_location FROM campaigns WHERE end_date > start_date ORDER BY campaign_name DESC
SELECT c.customer_name, cm.campaign_id FROM customers c JOIN customer_campaign_mapping cm ON c.customer_id = cm.customer_id
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT id, first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT email FROM customers WHERE last_name = 'Smith';
SELECT * FROM campaigns ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, budget FROM campaigns WHERE budget > 10000;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM campaigns ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT city, country, location_name FROM locations WHERE longitude > 0 AND latitude < 0;

SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, cm.campaign_id, cp.campaign_name FROM customers c JOIN customer_campaigns cm ON c.id = cm.customer_id JOIN campaigns cp ON cm.campaign_id = cp.campaign_id WHERE c.id = 2;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT id, name, email FROM customers WHERE latitude > 40.0;
SELECT id, name, email FROM customers ORDER BY latitude DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE longitude < -100;
SELECT name, email, latitude, longitude FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT campaign_id, COUNT(customer_id) as total_customers FROM marketing_campaigns GROUP BY campaign_id ORDER BY total_customers DESC;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE city = 'New York' AND state = 'NY';

SELECT activities.customer_id, customers.name, activities.activity_name, activities.activity_date FROM activities INNER JOIN customers ON activities.customer_id = customers.id ORDER BY activities.activity_date DESC;
